TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Top extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Drawing.Charts.DoubleType

Docs.summary: Top. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is c:y.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](../Token/openxmlnoticeiso_md.md)] **y (Top)** This element specifies the top of the chart element as a fraction of the height of the chart. If Top Mode is Factor, then the position is relative to the default position for the chart element. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |manualLayout (§21.2.2.104)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Floating Point Value)|Specifies that the contents of this attribute contain a floating point number.

The contents of this number are interpreted based on the context of the parent XML element.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *double* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_Double) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlcopyrightiso](../Token/openxmlcopyrightiso_md.md)]
